audioText: Je sens que cette décision va changer beaucoup de choses dans notre entreprise.
question: How does the speaker feel about the decision?
options: They sense it will change many things in their company
They think it will improve company profits
They believe it will cause major problems
They feel it won't have much impact
explanation: The text states 'Je sens que cette décision va changer beaucoup de choses dans notre entreprise' - I sense/feel that this decision will change many things in our company. The verb 'sens' (from 'sentir') means to sense, feel, or have an intuition about something.
